short: A patient triage system that reduced wait times and manual load.
problem: Long patient wait times and drop-off during triage; manual workflows causing high operational load.
approach: User research, intake flow redesign, iterative prototypes with clinicians.
solution: Built a triage web app, streamlined intake flows and introduced automated routing and basic analytics.

quote.text: Their team helped us build a patient triage system that reduced wait times by 40%.
quote.author: Dr. Amina

seo.title: HealthStart — patient triage app case study
seo.description: How HealthStart reduced patient wait times by 40%.

short: IoT-powered farm monitoring to improve yields and reduce waste.
problem: Farmers lacked real-time insights into soil health and crop conditions, leading to lower yields and inefficient water use.
approach: Deployed low-power soil sensors, connected edge gateways, and built a web dashboard with predictive models trained on historical data.
solution: Developed an IoT-based platform with soil sensors, weather integrations, and predictive analytics to provide actionable recommendations to farmers.
results: Early detection of crop diseases in 70% of flagged cases

quote.text: We finally have data to make smarter farming decisions. Yields have never been this high.
quote.author: Samuel Mwangi

seo.title: AgroTrack — IoT farm monitoring case study
seo.description: How AgroTrack improved yields and saved water using IoT and predictive analytics.

short: AI-driven adaptive learning platform for under-resourced schools.
problem: Students in rural schools had varying learning paces but lessons were delivered uniformly, causing disengagement and low pass rates.
approach: Conducted classroom observations, built adaptive learning models, and pilot-tested with teachers to refine content pacing.
solution: Created an AI-based platform that adjusts lesson difficulty in real time based on individual student performance and provides teacher dashboards for interventions.
results: Personalized learning paths for 90% of active users

quote.text: EduLift has transformed how our students learn — they stay engaged and learn at their own pace.
quote.author: Grace Otieno

seo.title: EduLift — adaptive learning case study
seo.description: How EduLift used AI to personalize learning and improve exam pass rates.
